definition: needless to say/it goes without saying
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: That the expansion of the Red Army must not be neglected for a single day goes without saying.
sentences.chinese: 至于一天也不要忽略扩大红军的工作，那更不待说了。

sentences.english: He regards the whole thing as very important, and treats it with the utmost attention.
sentences.chinese: 他很看重这件事情，认真程度就不待说了。
